mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MyReserve(myName, myJumin, myPhone, Email, reserveVaccine, reserveDate, reserveTime, reserveCenter, reserveNum, facilityName ) values(#{myName}, #{myJumin} , #{myPhone}, #{Email}, #{reserveVaccine}, #{reserveDate}, #{reserveTime}, #{reserveCenter}, seq_reserveNum.nextVal, #{facilityName})
INSERT INTO OtherReserve(otherName, otherJumin, otherPhone, myPhone) values(#{otherName}, #{otherJumin} , #{otherPhone}, #{myPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(OTHERNAME) FROM OtherReserve WHERE myPhone = #{myPhone}
select * from MyReserve where myPhone = #{myPhone} and myName = #{myName} and reserveNum = #{reserveNum}
select * from MyReserve where myPhone = #{myPhone} and myName = #{myName}
select * from MyReserve where myPhone = #{myPhone} and myName = #{myName} and myJumin = #{myJumin}
SELECT count(*) FROM MyReserve WHERE reserveCenter = #{reserveCenter } and facilityName = #{facilityName } and reserveTime = #{reserveTime} and RESERVEDATE = #{reserveDate}
